```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Install packages if you haven't already
```{r, eval=F}
install.packages("purrr")
install.packages("magick")
```

Load them when you got 'em
```{r}
library(purrr); 
library(magick);
```

Set your working directory
```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/GitHub/CommunicatingFigures/PPT_GIF/Dave_Limerick")
```

List those images  
Read them in  
Make the animation!
```{r}
gifname <- "Dave_Limerick"
```

```{r}
list.files(path = paste0(getwd(),"/"), pattern = "*.jpeg", full.names = T) %>% 
  map(image_read) %>% # reads each path file
  image_join() %>% # joins image
  image_animate(fps=0.5) %>% # animates, can set the Frames Per Second or number of loops
  image_write(paste0(getwd(),"/", gifname,".gif")) # write to current dir
```
